At least 120,000 gather in Berlin for latest round of protests against far-rightAround 120,000 people took to the streets of Berlin on Saturday in the fourth week of protests against the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD). Sat, 03 Feb 2024 14:01:38 GMT OUBSYM4PBBOERJYOMP4NQR6PWM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/least-120000-gather-berlin-latest-round-protests-against-far-right-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Dozens detained in Moscow at rally of Russian soldiers' wives, rights group saysDozens of people were detained by police in central Moscow on Saturday at a rally protesting against Russia's mobilisation of men to fight in Ukraine, a human rights group said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:40:34 GMT JENHLKNI7JPPPOKWEZXTGXW7EU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dozens-detained-moscow-rally- Russian-soldiers-wives-rights-group-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy, son of Italy's last king, dies aged 86Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy, the only son of Italy's last king, who lived in exile in neighbouring Switzerland for most of his life, has died aged 86 at his home in Geneva, a note by the Royal House of Savoy said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:06:54 GMT SEW3A4YNKNPQZFQYBLTFNXCVGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/obituary-vittorio-emanuele-savoy-son-italys-last-king-dies-ged-86-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
U.S. launches strikes in Iraq, Syria, nearly 40 reported killedThe strikes, which included the use of long-range B-1 bombers flown from the United States, were the first in a U.S. response to an attack in Jordan last weekend by Iran-backed militants that killed three U.S. troops. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:48:14 GMT 4ETDYVPK2FPAHKV7G5NZ6YE6CI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-launches-retaliatory-strikes-iraq-syria-nearly-40-reported-killed-2024-02-03/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Timour Azhari世界
India to replace troops in Maldives with civilians by MayIndia will remove its troops in the Maldives by May, the Maldivian Foreign Ministry said on Saturday, as the two countries seek agreement on a pullout that has strained ties. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:40:01 GMT ONKQWJCEP5MKTC4OVTZLHLKVCY https://www.reuters.com/world/india-replace-troops-maldives-with-civilians-by-may-2024-02-03/Krishn Kaushik, Mohamed Junayd世界
Ukraine's SBU hits Russia's Volgograd oil refinery in drone attack, source saysTwo Ukrainian drones struck a primary oil processing facility at the Volgograd oil refinery in southern Russia on Saturday in an operation conducted by the SBU security service, a Ukrainian source told Reuters. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:35:57 GMT RZRFOJIIKZLAHDI6J2GAZARFZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-sbu-hits-Russias-volgograd-oil-refinery-drone-attack-source-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Some in Senegalese opposition reject bid to delay presidential voteThe coalition backing Senegalese presidential candidate Khalifa Sall said on Saturday it was opposed to postponing the Feb. 25 election as proposed by another party which said it had concerns over the integrity of the vote. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:32:58 GMT 5AB5KVYOXRKVTP3PXS4SB24C2U https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/some-senegalese-opposition-reject-bid-delay-presidential-vote-2024-02-03/Diadie Ba, Bate Felix世界非洲
South Korea summons Russian envoy over criticism of President Yoon's remarksThe South Korean foreign ministry on Saturday summoned Russia's envoy in Seoul to lodge a complaint over Moscow's criticism of recent remarks by South Korea President Yoon Suk-yeol on North Korea's pursuit of a nuclear arsenal. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:20:24 GMT RTE2XOXEZVPMDPWW5PNHDWPUY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korea-summons- Russian-envoy-over-criticism-president-yoons-remarks-foreign-2024-02-03/Reuters世界
Airstrikes violate Iraqi and Syrian sovereignty, Iran saysIran's foreign ministry on Saturday condemned overnight U.S. air strikes in Iraq and Syria as "violations of the sovereignty and territorial integrity" of the two countries. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:11:03 GMT YKRMRHCLRNIGDP3XRE2V6ZZ4KM https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-condemns-us-air-strikes-violations-iraqi-syrian-sovereignty-2024-02-03/Reuters世界
Pakistan ex-PM Imran Khan and wife jailed for 7 years for unlawful marriageFormer Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Khan were sentenced to seven years in prison and fined on Saturday by a court that ruled their 2018 marriage broke the law, his party said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 10:55:09 GMT ZEGJDPCT4BMZHEFOH4B5YJ74C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khan-wife-get-7-years-unlawful-marriage-ary-news-2024-02-03/Gibran Peshimam, Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Israel pressures Gaza cities, health officials say 18 die in airstrikesIsraeli airstrikes killed 18 Palestinians in the Gaza cities of Rafah and Deir Al-Balah, Gaza health officials said on Saturday, as residents of the enclave feared Israel would expand its ground offensive into those last remaining areas where people have sought shelter. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 10:47:56 GMT 26AL3INDM5OIJNXHP3NB3DON44 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-keeps-Pressure-last-two-refugee-cities-kills-18-health-officials-2024-02-03/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
